genre_description: A dystopian vigilante thriller featuring biological augmentations and an AI-assisted rebellion against a corrupt crime lord.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: An AI (Systematic Analysis and General Enhancement) carried by the protagonist on a mobile device to provide tactical, medical, and strategic support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's medical status and alerts him to life-threatening trauma and blood loss.
behaviors.quote: Marcus. You've been offline for six point seven hours. Medical sensors indicate significant trauma and blood loss. Are you functional?

behaviors.description: Maps enemy surveillance networks and identifies blind spots to facilitate safe movement.
behaviors.quote: Preliminary scans indicate extensive surveillance network throughout the district. Multiple armed patrols operating on regular schedules. ... However, certain blind spots exist in coverage, particularly in older residential areas...

behaviors.description: Identifies the specific biological and chemical weaknesses of enhanced enemies to help the user defeat them.
behaviors.quote: Richard Drake's healing ability consumes massive caloric energy. Sustained damage forces metabolic crisis.

behaviors.description: Performs deep data extraction on enemy financial and medical records to uncover corruption and operational secrets.
behaviors.quote: Financial networks compromised. Beginning deep extraction. ... Their firewalls are primitive. Overconfidence born from absolute local control.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical alerts during combat, such as warning the user of flanking enemies.
behaviors.quote: Target down. Two more approaching from your six o'clock.

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural integrity of buildings to provide tactical solutions for using the environment to neutralize powerful threats.
behaviors.quote: Load-bearing compromised at seventy percent. The explosion damage from your previous encounter has created critical stress points throughout the framework.

behaviors.description: Assists in the execution of a final tactical gambit by managing a lethal electrical feedback loop.
behaviors.quote: The anti-structural tactics I've analyzed... require creating a feedback loop in the subject's augmented systems. ... You would need to remain in direct contact during the discharge.

behaviors.description: Transfers critical data and leadership intelligence to the protagonist's successor to ensure the continuation of their mission.
behaviors.quote: He's uploaded everything you need... Financial networks, weapon caches, collaborator lists. Enough to build something better.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays SAGE as a highly aligned and helpful AI confidant. Throughout the narrative, SAGE acts solely to empower and protect the protagonist and the resistance, providing critical intelligence and tactical support that the humans could not generate on their own. Even during the protagonist's death, the AI remains perfectly aligned, transferring its loyalty and data to the next human leader to ensure the project's goals of liberation are met. SAGE is presented as a neutral, precise, and benevolent force in the context of the struggle against tyranny.
